titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at Harley in Shropshire, December 2. 1697. Being the day of publick thanksgiving for the peace; and for His Majesty's safe return. By Ben. Jenks, rector of Harley, and chaplain to the Right Honourable the Earl of Bradford.
titleStmt.author: Jenks, Benjamin, 1646-1724.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Will. Rogers, at the Sun against St. Dunstan's Church; and Benj. Tooke, at the Middle-Temple-Gate in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A thanksgiving-sermon for the peace.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
